dc_title_s: British Columbia, Shuswap sheet: economic minerals and glacial striae; by George M. Dawson, assisted by James McEvoy, 1898; compiled and drawn by James McEvoy.; Shuswap sheet
dc_description_s: Covers an area in southeastern British Columbia. Most of the area covered is in the Regional District of North Okanagan; the area includes Adams Lake, Shuswap Lake, Salmon Arm, Enderby, Armstrong, and Vernon. Relief shown by contours, shading, and spot heights. Depths shown by soundings. Also shows roads, trails, and Indian villages. Includes inset of the northern portion of Adams Lake. "Sheet No. 11"--Upper margin. "669"--Lower right margin. 1 map: col.; 54 x 51 cm., on sheet 67 x 92 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Dawson, George Mercer, 1849-1901.,McEvoy, James, 1862-,Geological Survey of Canada.
dct_spatial_sm: Regional District of North Okanagan, British Columbia, Canada
